message:
Zip download speed is a function of your server's capabilities and the latency between client and server.

You can set content-length, but you have to send it before sending the data (since content-length is a header). In order to do that you have to know what value to set it to - before sending the data. So you can't zip on-the-fly anymore. You'd have to zip up the whole response in-memory (or on-disk) first, then set the pre-zipped response. So you'd use something like FileContentResult (in-memory) or FileStreamResult (on-disk) instead of the approach in this blog post.
